meta.name: Game model
meta.description: Entity "Game"

meta.name: Home team ID
meta.description: ID of the home team

meta.name: Visitor team ID
meta.description: ID of the visitor team

meta.name: Team ID home
meta.description: ID of the home team (dupplicate of HOME_TEAM_ID)

meta.name: Team ID away
meta.description: ID of the away team (dupplicate of VISITOR_TEAM_ID)

meta.name: Game Date EST
meta.description: Game's date

meta.name: Game status
meta.description: Status - Final means that the game is completed

meta.name: Home Team Nickname
meta.description: Nickname of the home team, derived from model team

meta.name: Visitor Team Nickname
meta.description: Nickname of the visiting team, derived from model team

meta.name: Points home team
meta.description: Number of points scored by home team

meta.name: Field goal percentage home
meta.description: Field Goal Percentage home team

meta.name: Free throw percentage home
meta.description: Free Throw Percentage of the home team

meta.name: Three point percentage home
meta.description: Three Point Percentage of the home team

meta.name: Assists home
meta.description: Assists of the home team

meta.name: Rebounds home
meta.description: Rebounds of the home team

meta.name: Points away team
meta.description: Number of points scored by away team

meta.name: Field goal percentage away
meta.description: Field Goal Percentage away team

meta.name: Free throw percentage away
meta.description: Free Throw Percentage of the away team

meta.name: Three point percentage away
meta.description: Three Point Percentage of the away team

meta.name: Assists away
meta.description: Assists of the away team

meta.name: Rebounds away
meta.description: Rebounds of the away team

meta.name: Home team won
meta.description: 1 if home team won the game
